title: Samsung turns your whole display into a fingerprint sensor!
description:

►►► This video ◄◄◄  

This week Nvidia showed that the AI wave is much bigger than expected & that they are riding it best, Samsung showed innovative new OLED displays with fingerprint & health sensors built-in and Microsoft showed Windows co-pilot & more at Build.
